summary: The module implements the core infrastructure for analyzing Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates in Checkov. It supplies abstract base classes for parameter and resource validation checks, utilities to parse template files, mechanisms to construct graph representations of resources, and a runner that orchestrates parsing, graph building, execution of both graphâ€‘based and Python checks, and aggregation of findings into a unified report.
business_intent: Provide a reusable framework that enables security and compliance scanning of ARM IaC files, allowing users to define, execute, and report on policy checks across template parameters and resources.
